description.p: This potion contains a thick, green liquid that smells like rotten meat.

When you drink this potion, you gain the trolls regeneration feature for 1 minute, providing you're in combat. At the start of each of your turns, you regain 5 hit points as long as you have at least 1 hit point. If you take acid or fire damage, this trait ceases to function at the start of your next turn.
